mapper.insert: insert into borrow_goods (borrow_id, user_id, create_time, price, description, photo_number, tag, title, period_of_validity, `state`, view_count) values (#{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{periodOfValidity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update borrow_goods set borrow_id = 0-#{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER} user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_number = #{photoNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period_of_validity = #{periodOfValidity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, view_count = #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select borrow_id, user_id, create_time, price, description, photo_number, tag, title, period_of_validity, `state`, view_count from borrow_goods where borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
